TextView.android:text: Passive: Grants the wearer 25 ability power every 5 seconds.
Passive: Basic attacks grant 6% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat. Stacks with no upper limit.
The wearer's magic and true damage from abilities heal the wearer and the lowest health ally for 33% of the damage dealt.
Passive: Enemies within 2 hexes have their magic resistance reduced by 50% (does not stack). When enemies within 2 hexes cast their ability, they are dealt 200% of their maximum mana as magic damage.
Passive: The holder's magic and true damage from abilities can critically strike.
Passive At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row to the left and right gain a 300 / 350 / 400 (based on Star level) health shield for 15 seconds.

Passive: Dealing magic or true damage with an ability applies a burn on the enemies hit for 10 seconds, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grevious Wounds for the duration
